# Claude Skills ‚Äî Full Capability Overview
*Last updated: February 24, 2026 | Auto-generated by Claude (Cowork mode)*

> **What are Skills?** Skills are specialised modules that extend Claude's capabilities beyond general conversation. Each skill contains domain-specific workflows, frameworks, and best practices refined through iteration. Invoke them by name in any session.

---

## How to Invoke a Skill

Simply describe what you need and Claude will trigger the relevant skill automatically, or you can call it directly:
- *"Review this contract"* ‚Üí triggers `legal:contract-review`
- *"Build me a dashboard from this CSV"* ‚Üí triggers `data:build-dashboard`
- *"Create a PowerPoint about X"* ‚Üí triggers `anthropic-skills:pptx`

---

## üìÑ Document Creation (Anthropic Core)

| Skill | What It Does | Best For |
|-------|-------------|---------|
| `anthropic-skills:docx` | Create, read, edit, or manipulate Word documents (.docx) | Reports, memos, letters, essays, proposals |
| `anthropic-skills:pptx` | Full PowerPoint creation and editing (.pptx) | Pitch decks, slide presentations, investor decks |
| `anthropic-skills:xlsx` | Excel spreadsheet creation, editing, formulas, charts | Financial models, data tables, budgets |
| `anthropic-skills:pdf` | PDF extraction, creation, merging, splitting, forms | Processing PDFs, filling forms, generating reports |
| `anthropic-skills:doc-coauthoring` | Structured co-authoring workflow for documentation | Technical specs, decision docs, proposals |
| `anthropic-skills:schedule` | Create scheduled tasks (on-demand or interval-based) | Recurring reports, automated reminders |
| `anthropic-skills:skill-creator` | Create, modify, and benchmark new skills | Building custom workflows |

**AIC relevance:** Use `pptx` for investor deck, `docx` for alpha reports and methodology documents, `pdf` for mock audit reports, `xlsx` for revenue models and AIC scoring matrices.

## üí∞ Finance

| Skill | What It Does |
|-------|-------------|
| `finance:financial-statements` | Income statements, balance sheets, cash flow with GAAP formatting and variance commentary |
| `finance:variance-analysis` | Decompose variances into drivers with waterfall charts and narrative |
| `finance:journal-entry-prep` | Journal entries with debits/credits and supporting documentation |
| `finance:reconciliation` | Reconcile GL to subledger, bank, or third-party data |
| `finance:close-management` | Month-end close task sequencing, dependencies, status tracking |
| `finance:audit-support` | SOX 404 compliance, control testing workpapers, sample selection |

**AIC relevance:** Use `finance:financial-statements` to build out the dual-track revenue model projections. Use `finance:variance-analysis` for investor materials showing AIC's financial runway.

## üì¶ Product Management

| Skill | What It Does |
|-------|-------------|
| `product-management:feature-spec` | Write full PRDs with problem statements, user stories, requirements, success metrics |
| `product-management:roadmap-management` | Create and prioritise roadmaps using RICE, MoSCoW, ICE |
| `product-management:competitive-analysis` | Feature comparison matrices, positioning analysis, competitive briefs |
| `product-management:user-research-synthesis` | Synthesise qualitative/quantitative research into insights and opportunity areas |
| `product-management:metrics-tracking` | Define, track, analyse product metrics ‚Äî OKRs, dashboards, trend analysis |
| `product-management:stakeholder-comms` | Draft stakeholder updates tailored to audience (exec, engineering, customers) |

**AIC relevance:** Use `feature-spec` to write PRDs for the Empathy Engine, AI Governance Index, and Self-Assessment Tool. Use `competitive-analysis` to compare AIC against B Corp, ISO 42001, and EU AI Act frameworks.

|-------|-------------|

| Skill | What It Does |

| `engineering:system-design` | Architecture decisions, ADRs, API design, data modelling, service boundaries |
| `engineering:code-review` | Security, performance, correctness, and maintainability review |
| `engineering:documentation` | READMEs, runbooks, API docs, architecture docs, onboarding guides |
| `engineering:testing-strategy` | Test strategies, test plans, coverage analysis, test architecture |
| `engineering:tech-debt` | Identify, categorise, and prioritise technical debt |
| `engineering:incident-response` | Triage production incidents, communications, postmortems |

**AIC relevance:** Use `system-design` when designing the Audit Ledger cryptographic hash-chain or Empathy Engine API. Use `code-review` to verify the RLS PostgreSQL policies are watertight. Use `documentation` to maintain the knowledge base.

**AIC relevance:** Use `accessibility-review` ‚Äî AIC enforces digital rights, so its own platform must be accessible. Use `ux-writing` for the Self-Assessment Tool interface copy. Use `design-critique` on the Empathy Engine output UI.

## üì£ Brand Voice

| Skill | What It Does |
|-------|-------------|
| `brand-voice:discover-brand` | Autonomously search connected platforms for brand materials (Notion, Confluence, Drive, etc.) |
| `brand-voice:guideline-generation` | Generate full brand voice guidelines from documents, transcripts, and discovery reports |
| `brand-voice:brand-voice-enforcement` | Apply brand guidelines to new content creation ‚Äî ensures consistent tone and messaging |

**AIC relevance:** AIC's voice ‚Äî *authoritative but accessible, rights-first, non-legalistic* ‚Äî needs to be consistent across the Declaration, Index, and investor materials. Use `guideline-generation` to codify this.

## üìä Data

| Skill | What It Does |
|-------|-------------|
| `data:data-exploration` | Profile datasets ‚Äî shape, quality, distributions, nulls, outliers |
| `data:statistical-analysis` | Descriptive stats, trend analysis, outlier detection, hypothesis testing |
| `data:data-visualization` | Publication-quality charts with Python (matplotlib, seaborn, plotly) |
| `data:interactive-dashboard-builder` | Self-contained interactive HTML dashboards with Chart.js and filters |
| `data:sql-queries` | Optimised SQL for Snowflake, BigQuery, Databricks, PostgreSQL |
| `data:data-validation` | QA analyses before sharing ‚Äî methodology, accuracy, bias checks |
| `data:data-context-extractor` | Extract tribal knowledge from analysts to build custom data skills |

**AIC relevance:** Use `data:interactive-dashboard-builder` to build the AI Governance Index leaderboard prototype. Use `data:statistical-analysis` to validate bias scores from the Empathy Engine. Use `data:sql-queries` for AIC's PostgreSQL database.

## ‚öñÔ∏è Legal

| Skill | What It Does |
|-------|-------------|
| `legal:nda-triage` | Screen NDAs ‚Äî classify as GREEN (standard), YELLOW (review), or RED (significant issues) |
| `legal:contract-review` | Review contracts against negotiation playbook ‚Äî flag deviations, generate redlines |
| `legal:compliance` | GDPR, CCPA, POPIA ‚Äî review DPAs, handle data subject requests |
| `legal:legal-risk-assessment` | Severity √ó likelihood risk framework with escalation criteria |
| `legal:meeting-briefing` | Structured briefings for meetings with legal relevance + action tracking |
| `legal:canned-responses` | Templated responses for routine legal inquiries |

**AIC relevance:** This is directly in AIC's domain. Use `legal:compliance` to model what POPIA compliance looks like for AIC's own data handling. Use `legal:contract-review` when reviewing Alpha participant agreements.

## Quick Reference ‚Äî AIC Priority Skills

For where AIC is right now (February 2026), the highest-value skills are:
